summary: Provides the training pipeline for multi‑subject DreamBooth, handling data preparation, model loading, optimization, and periodic validation image generation using the Accelerate library and Hugging Face Diffusers.
business_intent: Allows developers and researchers to fine‑tune text‑to‑image diffusion models on several personalized subjects, enabling customized image generation for applications such such as branding, content creation, or AI research.
